control.visible: [[Skin.HasSetting(darkinfopane) | Control.IsVisible(700)] | !Skin.HasSetting(DisableGlowbar)] + [Control.IsVisible(7550) | Control.IsVisible(700) | Control.IsVisible(510) | Control.IsVisible(50) | Control.IsVisible(518) | [Control.IsVisible(500) + !Skin.HasSetting(wallfullscreen)] | Control.IsVisible(52) | Control.IsVisible(550)]

Skin.HasSetting(showcasecdart) + IsEmpty(Container.ListItem.Art(discart)) + Container.Content(movies) + !SubString(ListItem(0).Path,videodb://movies/sets) + Skin.Hassetting(fakedischandwriting) + !IsEmpty(Container.ListItem.Art(poster)) + Skin.Hassetting(fakehanddisccolor) + Control.IsVisible(750)

Skin.HasSetting(showcasecdart) + IsEmpty(Container.ListItem.Art(discart)) + Container.Content(movies) + !SubString(ListItem(0).Path,videodb://movies/sets) + Skin.Hassetting(Fakedischandwriting) + !IsEmpty(Container.ListItem.Art(poster)) + Skin.Hassetting(fakehanddisccolor) + Control.IsVisible(750)

onfocus.condition: Skin.HasSetting(fstrailer) | Control.IsVisible(57) | Control.IsVisible(510) | Control.IsVisible(52) | Control.IsVisible(50) | Control.IsVisible(500)

control.visible: Control.IsVisible(57) | [Control.IsVisible(508) + Skin.HasSetting(movielogosfloor)] | [Control.IsVisible(508) + Skin.HasSetting(tvshowlogosfloor)] | [Control.IsVisible(500) + !StringCompare(Container.FolderName,youtube) + Skin.HasSetting(tvshowlogosfloor)] | Control.IsVisible(501) | [Control.IsVisible(499) + Skin.HasSetting(WallLargeLogo)]
